column4: Hi, I've got a box that won't boot because of file system errors.  At boot, it says I need to run fsck manually.  Problem is, I'm not sure how.  Any help?
can you boot into recovery mode?
recovery mode may give you the fsck option
How do you access recover mode?
at the boot menu.. press escape a couple of times when you first start your computer.. it should give you a grub boot menu in which will be a recovery mode option
Okay, I'll give that a shot.  Thank you!
